description: Proceed straight along the wooden pedestrian promenade, keeping the modern building with the white geometric lattice facade on your left. Walk past the 'Tao Lounge Bar' and its red outdoor seating. Stop near the black awning labeled 'Asian Restaurant & Bar'.
